uk.ac.liv.auction.agent
Class FixedValuer

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.liv.auction.agent.FixedValuer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, ValuationPolicy, AuctionEventListener, Parameterizable, Resetable
Direct Known Subclasses:
IntervalValuer
public class FixedValuer
extends java.lang.Object
implements ValuationPolicy, java.io.Serializable

A valuation policy in which we maintain a fixed private valuation independent of time or auction.

Version:
$Revision$
Author:
Steve Phelps
